data.fullContent: After a yoga session all participants were peaceful and happy. A real rush began on his group. Gradually he got more and more yoga classes, until he had almost every day in the week two groups. And on weekends, he regularly hosted a yoga weekend.
data.answer: 瑜伽课程结束后，所有参与者都感到平静和快乐。一场真正的进攻开始了。渐渐地，他上的瑜伽课越来越多，直到他每周几乎每天都分两组。在周末，他会定期举办瑜伽周末活动。
